plot: The first full-time Female Engagement Teams deployed to Afghanistan in 2010. The teams embed into units and work to engage the Afghan women as a part of the counterinsurgency war.
title: A Female Engagement Team
plot_es: The first full-time Female Engagement Teams deployed to Afghanistan in 2010. The teams embed into units and work to engage the Afghan women as a part of the counterinsurgency war.
plot_en: The first full-time Female Engagement Teams deployed to Afghanistan in 2010. The teams embed into units and work to engage the Afghan women as a part of the counterinsurgency war.
